nl.esciencecenter.octopus.engine.files

Class PathCpi

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.octopus.engine.files.PathCpi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Path

    public class PathCpi
extends Object
implements Path
    Default implementation of Path. Will create new Paths directly, using either an adaptor identical to the original in case of an absolute path, or the local adaptor in case of a relative path.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
